mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ,A.G_CODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT, A.R_DATE,B.G_PRICE FROM R_BBS A INNER JOIN GOODS B ON A.G_CODE = B.G_CODE WHERE A.G_CODE LIKE #{category}|| '%'

SELECT RNUM,SEQ,G_CODE,TITLE,CONTENT,R_DATE,G_PRICE,G_IMG FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,SEQ,G_CODE,TITLE,CONTENT,R_DATE,G_PRICE,G_IMG FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM,A.SEQ,A.G_CODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT, A.R_DATE,B.G_PRICE , B.G_IMG FROM R_BBS A INNER JOIN GOODS B ON A.G_CODE = B.G_CODE WHERE A.G_CODE LIKE #{category}|| '%' ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startindex} AND #{endindex}
SELECT A.SEQ,A.G_CODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT, A.R_DATE,B.G_PRICE,A.READCOUNT,B.G_IMG FROM R_BBS A INNER JOIN GOODS B ON A.G_CODE = B.G_CODE WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT A.SEQ,A.G_CODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT, A.R_DATE,B.G_PRICE , B.G_IMG FROM R_BBS A INNER JOIN GOODS B ON A.G_CODE = B.G_CODE WHERE A.G_CODE LIKE #{category}|| '%' AND A.TITLE LIKE #{title}|| '%' ORDER BY
${lists} ASC
${lists} DESC

SELECT A.SEQ,A.G_CODE,A.TITLE,A.CONTENT, A.R_DATE,B.G_PRICE , B.G_IMG FROM R_BBS A INNER JOIN GOODS B ON A.G_CODE = B.G_CODE WHERE A.TITLE LIKE #{title}|| '%'
